text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 465 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS Land uses, activities, and delivery z Development should consist of a mixed-use, residential-led scheme with a mix of retail, workspace, community and cultural uses and the provision of a health centre, primary school and community centre. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – Town centre uses (Class E) – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – NHS primary health care facility (reprovision and expansion) – Primary school – Community centre – Transport interchange z Redevelop and improve the town centre with an anchor supermarket
